PHRASE.LANG: Excuse me, but could you tell me which way is the beach? [#Legal]

Scusi, come si arriva alla spiaggia? [#Legal]
Disculpa, ¿podrías decirme por dónde se va a la playa? [#Legal]
Excuse me, but could you tell me which way is the beach? [#Legal]
不好意思，可以告訴我去海灘怎麼走嗎？ [#Legal]
